name: ShortUrl Tracker
author: @BuildYourWeb

sections.description:
ShortUrl Tracker allow you to create Short URL directly from your WordPress administration. You can search for product, page, categories etc…
It integrates Google Analytics URL Tags but also custom Param. Careful, this plugin works with a license that’s deliver directly from
our website https://buildyourweb.fr/plugin-shorturl-tracker.

Features

Three licences are available and each proposed specific features. Note that an upper license will include all features from the lower level License.
You can also upgrade or downgrade licence level.

Free License:

  • 60 links/month
  • Generate QRcode for each link
  • Google Analytics UTM tag
  • Total Link created
  • Track QRcode Scan
  • Track Clicks
  • 30 days view
  • 30 days Historic Links
  • Share on Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Mail)

Medium License:

  • 240 links/month
  • All Free license features
  • Date range unlimited
  • Track Device
  • Add custom Param
  • Search and Add product variation
  • Give name to Links
  • Attach Link to campaign
  • Get Top Link (on Global view & by Campaign)
  • Create Campaigns
  • Campaign Dashboard
  • Links Attached to Campaign

Premium License:

  • Unlimited links/month
  • All Free & Medium licenses features
  • Cookie Lifetime specification
  • Woocommerce integration
  • Sales Tracking
  • Global Sales Tracking
  • All next evolution

Installation instructions :

  1. Download and activate the plugin from the administration of your WordPress site.
  2. Go to the plugin configuration page in the “Settings” menu of your WordPress site.
  3. Go to WP Tracking > Settings and fill in the license key. Get a licence here

Support:

  • If you have any problems installing or using the plugin, please open a support ticket on the support forum here.
  • To report a bug or submit a suggestion for a new feature, you can contact us at support-sut @buildyourweb.fr

This plugin works on the services developed by Build Your Web company and under Plugin Terms of Service
sections.faq:
Can i change my license level at any time ?

Yes! you just need to connect to your Build Your Web account and change your subscription

Is this plugin Free ?

Yes! We have 3 license (Free, Medium and Premium).

How can i get all next feature ?

You have to take the Premium plugin to have access to all future evolution.

Can I create Campaign to group links ?

Yes! you can create campaign and track Campaign performance from Medium Feature.

Does the plugin generate QR Code ?

Yes! with a free license, a Qrcode is automatically generated when you short an url.

Where can I get support ?

You can post your questions on the support forum here
